thread.title: Hackers who targeted Samsung Pay may be looking to track individuals - CIO
thread.title_full: Hackers who targeted Samsung Pay may be looking to track individuals - CIO - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: CIO
title: Hackers who targeted Samsung Pay may be looking to track individuals - CIO
text:
The security breach at Samsung subsidiary LoopPay was probably more about spying than about gathering consumer data for profit, and the worst could be yet to come, a security analyst said Wednesday. which it acquired in February for technology that it uses in its Samsung Pay service.
Start the conversation, or Read more at CIO.
